name: Climbing Challenge
description:
Climb to the highest point and you will win. I will wait for you at the highest point.

This is a fascinating elimination-type casual game, in which you need to accumulate points through precise graphic elimination to unlock each exquisite CG picture. The rules of the game are simple. Hold down the left mouse button and connect adjacent and identical graphics with lines to eliminate them. As the elimination progresses, you will continue to improve your score, and only when you reach a certain score can you unlock the next exciting CG picture.

Each level starts at the bottom, and you can choose your starting position and, through clever strategy, move your character to the top. Successfully eliminating graphics will earn you points, and only when you reach your target score will you unlock the next unique CG picture. This will motivate players to constantly challenge themselves and improve their skills to obtain higher scores and unlock more beautiful CG images. In the process, you will experience the sense of accomplishment and fun of the game, and constantly pursue higher scores to show off your elimination skills.
